name: Sapa Relax Hotel & Spa
address: 19A Dong Loi, Sapa Town, Lao Cai, Sa Pa, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Sa Pa, cách Trạm cáp treo Fansipan 5.4 km, Sapa Relax Hotel & Spa cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có khu vườn, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên. Ngoài nhà hàng, khách sạn 3 sao này có các phòng được trang bị điều hòa và Wi-Fi miễn phí, trong đó mỗi phòng sẽ có phòng tắm riêng. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Các căn đi kèm tủ lạnh, minibar, ấm đun nước, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và bàn làm việc. Mỗi phòng đều có tủ quần áo và TV màn hình phẳng, ngoài ra một số phòng tại khách sạn có ban công. Tại Sapa Relax Hotel & Spa, các phòng được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Hồ Sa Pa, Sa Pa Stone Church và Sa Pa Bus Station. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách Sapa Relax Hotel & Spa 221 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The staff is really helpful and they gave us complimentary breakfast. The rooms are really clean and comfortable. This one is most recommended if you are staying in sapa. Breakfast spread is delicious, and sky bar is picturesque

review.rating: Hot showers, helpful staff, good breakfast
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Staff were generally very accommodating. We did a hike up Mt Fansipan with a 5am start and they provided us with a packed breakfast. The buffet on the second morning was also very varied (with a lot of western and Asian options). Nice hot shower, nice rooftop.

review.comment_positive:
1. Tầm nhìn siêu đẹp thấy trọn cảnh núi, y như hình với giá này là quá tốt
2. Phòng ốc rất sạch sẽ, mới tinh, nội thất xịn xò, đầy đủ tiện nghi
3. Ở ngay trung tâm, đi bộ ra khu ăn uống trung tâm được & đi đâu cũng gần. Gần Sun Plaza - nhà ga cáp treo, gần Nhà thờ đá, Quảng trường... đi bộ vài bước là tới.
4. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ check-out muộn, hỗ trợ nhanh chóng các thiết bị như bàn ủi,...
review.comment_negative: KS nên xem lại lan can ban công vì chắc do ở trung tâm gần khu dân cư nên hơi bụi chút.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive:
Great view from the 6th floor cafe. The cafe offers very nice smoothies.
Family room (connected room) had a bath tub with ample hot water every time.
Free breakfast.
review.comment_negative:
Quite rundown, dated rooms. Very noisy at night, no soundproof. Got cockroaches one night. Very small sized room for Vietnam standards. Towels are already shredded and old.
Our room was just 1 meters away from neighbors building, no privacy nor “city” views but somebody’s wet clothes hanging outside at their balcony.
Book for the “mountain views “, if not, try other hotels for better view&stay..

review.rating: Loved this place! We would totally recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The staff was very welcoming and helpful, gave us recommendations for Sapa and made sure we had the best stay possible. The room was very big and clean. The breakfast was one of the best we had during our trip in Vietnam!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located on a charming alley in downtown Sapa surrounded by wonderful restaurants all within walking distance. The hotel also offers a great breakfast, tour guidance, spa services and a fabulous rooftop view of the city and surrounding countryside. Mr. OK Nguyen, Duty Manager, helps lead a team of individuals who provide outstanding customer service with responsive and friendly support to all inquiries. Feels like "home" when you stay there. Highly recommend!
review.comment_negative: Can't think of any need for improvement - all was perfect!

review.rating: Great value and place to stay in Sapa. Would recommend a stay here
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The property was tucked away just off of the main road, so it was easy to access yet far enough away that you didn’t get too much street noise and traffic. The room itself was quaint and had everything a person would need for a stay after a day of trekking or adventuring in the town. The staff were incredibly friendly and professional and the manager was kind enough to include us in the buffet breakfast even though we didn’t originally have that included in our stay. The hotel provided a wonderful spread of food for the breakfast as well. We also booked a very last minute tour through the hotel and they arranged it for us which was helpful!

Great location near well-reviewed eateries. Spacious and comfortable room with a nice view. Convenient and affordable massage located right in the hotel.

review.rating: Hài lòng. Lễ tân nhiệt tình
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Mình trú tại khách sạn vào khoảng đầu tuần, cảm giác không đông lắm. Do di chuyển bằng xe cá nhân nên khách sạn sắp xếp chỗ đỗ xe ngay đối diện khách sạn. rất thuận tiện. 
-Tới nơi trời hơi mưa, các bạn lễ tân ra tận xe để hạ hành lý dùm, sau thủ tục nhận phòng bọn mình quên mang valy lên lễ tân cũng mang tận phòng hộ :))) nchung rất tận tình và hài lòng
*Khách sạn rộng rãi sạch sẽ, trang thiết bị ổn so với tầm giá, tuy nhiên các bạn chốt phòng sớm thì mới có được phòng view đẹp chút nhé
*Đợt mình đi khách sạn có tặng kèm bữa sáng 2 ngày chứ không nằm trong giá phòng, kèm theo 1 voucher đồ uống cho rooftop cafe của khách sạn
Chung quy là hài lòng với chỗ ở so với số tiền bỏ ra, vị trí đi lại rất thuận tiện.
Note: mải chơi quên mất không chụp ảnh phòng :)))
review.comment_negative: Phòng mình trong phòng tắm có thể nghe thấy tiếng đường ống thoát nước hơi rõ chút, ai kỹ tính có thể hơi khó chịu, tuy nhiên không phải vấn đề lớn với mình

review.comment_positive: The location was fantastic, in the middle of Sapa town with a short walk to the Main Street with plenty of shops and restaurants. Rooms were generally clean and comfortable which provided a nice stay.
review.comment_negative: The pictures on booking.com are a little outdated and the hotel in general is more run down than you expect. The first room we stayed in which was smaller had no shower door and no power points on the bed side tables and the second bigger room only had a bath with no proper shower which leaked and flooded the bathroom.

review.rating: Quiet and comfortable stay in modern luxury surroundings.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Quiet room with great Internet as requested. Very large bed with comfortable mattress topper, good AC, and modern lighting and fixtures. View from the balcony was a show stopper, esp in the morning.
Shower water heated up quickly, with good water pressure from the waterfall showerhead. No conditioner provided, but shampoo and soap are there. Other amenities include combs, toothbrushes, shower caps, tea and coffee and a kettle, bottled water, bathrobe.
The hotel itself is located on the edge of the valley, across from Fansipan - great location, close proximity to lots of food and drinks options.
Breakfast service was great - especially loved my beef pho made to order and the coffee service.
Try the 6 floor SkyView terrace at sunset!
review.comment_negative:
I wish the lobby was smoke free. And maybe the front of the hotel. I was trying to get some rest after the overnight train, and I kept waking up because the smoke smell was so strong.
I asked to borrow a shower after being on a plane and then a train for 48 hours, and initially the hotel said yes, they would be able to provide this. But when I arrived to drop bags, they said they couldn't help me. Maybe read the requests more carefully?
Because I was 4th floor and the SkyView terrace was 6th floor, I heard a great deal of karaoke one night. Wish they had a cut off time for noise ordinance, as it was likely disturbing sleep for other guests. The other night, no karaoke.

review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi

review.comment_positive: Great location in central Sapa with large room/facilities. The staff we friendly/helpful and accommodating to any needs you might have.
review.comment_negative: No attached shower head and the bath wobbled when standing in it to use the shower head attachment; still functioning but a free standing shower would have been our preference.

review.rating: AWESOME Stay in Sapa for everyone who likes a fabulous buffet breakfast, shopping, close to sights
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Awesome hotel located within walking distance to Cat2 village, restaurants, shopping and cable car station Sun Plaza. The deluxe room prepared for us with pair of Swans made from towels was a nice gesture to welcome us in the bedroom besides a welcome drink at lobby.. Sleeping on their satin smooth cotton bed linen felt divine incomparable to even 5 star hotel bed linen. 
Their buffet breakfast was AWESOME, love the high quality foods, Intercontinental and local Vietnamese dishes like pho bo, beef stew, fried rice, noodles besides the usual eggs, cheese ham offering. Vietnamese coffee was good too. The variety of freshly cut fruits and delectable desserts served at breakfast was commendable.  Staff service superb as empty plates were quickly cleared from dining table. 

The view of mountains on L6 cafe was awesome for a city location hotel. The bedroom AC was operating well during May month and they even have a stand fan. The bath room shower and bidet worked well with good water pressure.  The bathroom amenities  are superb, complete set of plush white towels changed every day was luxurious service. 

The Wifi strength and stability performed well during my stay in May. The bedroom and hotel area has good coverage, no breakoff of connection , very critical for Guests that need to conduct work or creating content on social media 😊

Highly recommended for your 1 st Sala stay to couples, singles and families and business group.
review.comment_negative: Nothing material.  Noise from immediate neighbour houses, traffic is expected in town center area.  The sounds from neighbouring room may occasionally be heard.

review.comment_positive: This is a great mid priced hotel . It represents fantastic value for money . Centrally located , the staff spoke terrific English and really looked after their guests . You could see them all trying to get people into their rooms as early as possible as most people arrive in Sapa early in the morning . The rooms were really pleasant and clean and we loved our view. Sapa is hilly and it's a slight walk up a hill to get to the main square . Would stay again !

review.rating: A beautiful gem of a place in lovely Sapa Town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: I loved everything about the place, it was walking distance to various food outlets, mini marts, coffee shops, souvenir shops, Sapa Station and Sapa Town centre. The room was so comfortable and spacious, the bathrooms clean and the best part were the staff. So hospitable and friendly. My friend and I arrived at 4am and they allowed us to sit in the lobby, use the facilities to freshen up and gave FREE coffee. My package didn't include breakfast but when we checked-in, they gave it to us complementary. The view of the valley was beautiful. I am so happy i stayed there, it was definitely one of the best parts of the trip.
review.comment_negative: A very small matter, some stains on the beddings, which with a good dose of Clorox will come right off.

review.comment_positive: The restaurant food offering was amazing, as was the rooftop bar. The staff were really friendly and the location was perfect.
review.comment_negative: The room was really nice, however it was looking a little worn with age (missing blinds in bathroom, etc.). I dropped a pen under the sofa and when I went to retrieve it, I saw that it hadn't been cleaned in a long time. The sitting room area didn't have any lamps, so was quite dark.

review.rating: Pour le prix je recommande cet hôtel pour la proximité de tout.
review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive: L'emplacement était bien, à côté de tout commerces et restaurants ainsi que d'une banque pour le change de monnaie . J'ai loué 2 chambre, une vue sur la montagne et une vue sur la ville, pour les vues il y a de meilleurs hôtel à Sapa, celui ci est trop autour de bâtiment, si vous n'êtes pas au dernier étage vous, serez mal lotis question vue. Mais dans l'ensemble c'est un très bon hôtel et le personnel sympathique.
review.comment_negative: Baignoire non fixé, si on se met au bord elles s'inclines un peut, sa surprend.

review.rating: Friendly staff but old and outdated hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff were really nice. The hotel was in a good central location. They were able to help us book tours.
review.comment_negative:
This hotel is okay... The style  is very old and outdated . Breakfast is included but it's strange. Seems to be on a token system where the staff say they will give you a token as a kind of good will gesture . I don't understand why it was just not included as all the other hotels we have stayed at in vietnman just have free breakfast included and we don't have to earn tokens at the manager's discretion. 

The first room we stayed in had a really bad smell and there was a problem with the drains..however the staff did allow us to move to a better room once we complained. 

I would suggest you pay extra for a view as our view was the water tanks outside which could be quite loud when they were turned on in the morning.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel and great staff, great location would recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: beautiful rooftop views

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
La atención, las intalaciones, el desayuno y la ayuda continua del personal. Recomiendo este hotel a todo el mundo que vaya a Sapa. Además tiene un bar/restaurante en el último piso donde relajarte tomando algo. Cada día te reponen el te, el café y el agua en la habitación. El manager del hotel nos regaló el desayuno de los tres días y al hacer el check-out nos obsequió con un regalo tradicional de la zona. Està muy cerca del centro però justo a la distancia necesaria para no molestar el ruido. 
Apuesta sobre seguro. Si volvemos, repetimos.

There was a lovely swimming pool and the bedroom was spacious and clean. She provided breakfast every morning and her coffee was the best vietnamese coffee of the trip. Would 100% recommend, such a lovely and welcoming vibe!!

review.comment_positive: Das Hotel war für mich ein herausragender Aufenthalt. Besonders beeindruckt hat mich das äußerst freundliche und hilfsbereite Personal, angeführt vom Manager. Sie waren stets zur Stelle, um alle meine Bedürfnisse zu erfüllen. Die Lage des Hotels in Sa Pa war perfekt, mit einfachem Zugang zu Sehenswürdigkeiten und Restaurants und einem Motorrad Verleih direkt neben an. Die Zimmer waren komfortabel und gut gepflegt. Ich kann dieses Hotel wärmstens empfehlen und freue mich auf meinen nächsten Besuch.
review.comment_negative: Es ist bedauerlich, dass ich trotz der dazugebuchten Aussicht auf die Berge während meines Aufenthalts leider auf der anderen Seite des Hotels untergebracht wurde. Dies war eine kleine Enttäuschung, da ich mich auf die Aussicht gefreut hatte. Dennoch durch das top Personal und Guter Lage kein Problem gewesen da man alles in kürzester Zeit besuchen konnte.

review.comment_positive: The breakfast was very good. A wide selection of dishes to choose from and well laid out. One dish I liked in particular was the beef stew, Never eaten beef stew that was so delicious. The location was good too being quite centrally located and within easy reach of many sights and attractions. Many within easy walking distance. Also some very good restaurants nearby. All staff were friendly, helpful and polite. A special mention to Mr, Tuoi and Mr,Daoc at reception who kindly assisted us with our requests and inquiries and who were very helpful in making our travel arrangements.

Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive:
The view was fantastic from our room and it was very spacious!
The staff were outstanding! When we couldn't procure a cab through the Grab App (Uber for Vietnam), the front desk clerk  made a call and there was a cab out front in moments. Additionally, when we checked out, we had left a single beverage in the fridge. Before we had walked out the door, an attendant had scanned our room and brought it to us. This is immaculate attention to detail, and we were very impressed.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: We really liked the friendly and great service from all staff. The location was perfect, especially with scooter rental opposite, and Little Sapa restaurant nearby to eat! The Skybar was really nice too.
review.comment_negative: The bathrooms weren't as clean as they could be, limescale on the shower, some mould and some rust. Our room also didn't have a visible window from the bed so felt quite dark. The spa could also do with a bit of love, as it feels a lot like a basement in the sauna rooms.

review.comment_positive: Sapa Relax Hotel & Spa exceeded my expectations in every way. The breakfast was not only tasty but offered a variety of options to suit every palate. The room was comfortable and well-appointed, providing a cozy retreat after a day of exploration with a breathtaking view, adding an extra layer of magic to my stay.The hotel staff=👍. From the warm welcome at check-in to the attentive service throughout my stay, every member of the team went above and beyond to ensure I had a memorable experience.Located in a prime spot, it made accessing Sapa's attractions effortless. I highly recommend this hotel for a memorable stay in Sapa.

review.comment_positive: Das Personal war unglaublich freundlich, herzlich und bemüht. Uns wurde das  Frühstück sowie eine Handtasche beim Check-Out geschenkt. Im hauseigenen Spa konnte man unkompliziert eine Massage buchen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Their staffs esp the guys at the reception had been very welcoming and helpful whenever we asked for help or information. We arrived very early in the morning and they helped us stored our luggages while we explored Sapa while waiting for check in. 

Rooms and bathroom are very spacious and very clean. Body shampoo, shampoo, razors and even combs are provided. Thx for the free complimentary breakfast! They even provide an extra standing fan in each room. Loved the view at the rooftop sky bar! 

Location wise super strategic and convenient. Only less than 5 mins walk to Sapa train station, good selection of restaurants less than 5 mins away, and about 5 mins walk to main Sapa town. Hotel area is safe to walk late night and not too noisy or busy.
review.comment_negative:
Nothing much to dislike. Everything was good.
We only encountered some issues with the aircond most likely bcoz its manually switched on and off and we most likely did not know how to operate it.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: beds were clean
review.comment_negative: toilet was not clean, neighbours were extremely loud at 7am in the morning and late at night (they were shouting across rooms). we received a welcome note stating there was breakfast, but later when we called the reception, there is no breakfast served on weekdays. we also called the reception for a taxi to bus station quoting 25k VND, but when we booked the taxi at the reception it became 40k VND. we were also told that drinking water is free but was charged 40K for 2 small bottles in the minibar - when I questioned the staff, they said the water on the table was free but not the ones in the minibar (which did not make sense as they were the exact same bottles). the staff later waived off the cost out of “goodwill” and asked for a 10/10 rating. I also paid premium for a mountain view room but unfortunately there was no view at all - we realised sapa was foggy on all 3 days we were here. overall we felt the stay was not worth it as there were other hotels offering free dinners and laundry service at possibly cheaper price

review.rating: Great comfortable hotel in a great location with great staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The staff were excellent and friendly, particularly the manager OK Nguyen who made sure we was happy and looked after. We arrived very early before check-in, the hotel was full so no early check-in available but OK Nguyen provided us with a room to shower and freshen up free of charge, whilst we waited for our rooms to become available.  I booked 3 rooms and for one of the rooms i required a larger room to accommodate 3 persons, OK Nguyen provided a free upgraded suite which was amazing.  

The location is excellent, convenient and within walking distance to everywhere.

The rooms were clean and a very comfortable large double bed.

I fully recommend this hotel, was happy with our stay and would definitely come back.
review.comment_negative: I had booked this hotel especially for the amazing view of Sapa from its rooftop bar, I got no view because the time we spent here the weather was very foggy, you literally cannot see anything but this is not the fault of the hotel.

review.comment_negative: Es gab einige Wackelkontakte bei den Lichtern (nachts hat eine Lampe geflackert). Das Zimmer hätte noch sauberer sein können (z. B. Badfugen, hinter dem Vorhang etc). Das Personal hätte herzlicher sein können (es wurde selten gegrüßt).

The location of course, its almost close to everything, 10 min walk to Sapa station and other attractions

The special thing about Sapa people is that they always wear this innocent welcoming smile.
Will definitely recommend this stay to anyone

review.rating: A good place to stay in SaPa
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: The hotel is nice, located conveniently near the center. The staff were very attentive, helped us with arranging a taxi to the bus station after check-out, and gave advice on places to buy souvenirs. The breakfast is quite diverse and there is a good view from the 6th floor.
review.comment_negative: The pillows weren't very comfortable, nor the mattresses, they felt a bit dated. There was some reddish stains on the sheets, probably from the water, but still not great to see when you lay on them.

review.rating: Many Thanks for the 10 stars hospitality. We'll definitely stay here again!
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Normally we don't review hotel. We just come and go. This is even our first review of a hotel.
Our experience of Sapa Relax hotel is like being a guest of a very close friend that has missed you for a very long time. The staff works beyond extra mile.

We were assisted by Duoc Nguyen (Mr. Ok) beyond the length of his job. He brought us and dine with us were the best & cheap bbq restaurant in Sa Pa. During our conversation we made a comment about the coffee at breakfast, next morning we have our own drip coffee - through the length of our stay he personally serve us drip coffee. On our last day as a breakfast treat we were given a banana pancake - FOC and some souvenirs from the hotel. 

About the rooms, we have no complain - everything is fine.
The mountain view is perfect in this hotel. You just need to hit their 6th floor viewing deck and you will see the grandeur of the mountains of Sa Pa, Vietnam.
review.comment_negative: Well there's only one wish I would want to improve, since we have stayed during the coldest season 13-19 Dec 2022. I wish that they could improve the coffee during morning breakfast, we preferred our coffee to be Piping hot..  It only improve when we were personally serve by Duoc Nguyen (Mr. Ok) every morning with his specially brewed drip coffee... Excellent staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Freundlich und hilfsbereit
review.comment_negative: Das Hotel liegt in einer lärmigen Umgebung. Mann hört schon am frühen Morgen das Personal bzw im  5. OG den Fahrstuhl.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: Superb staff, welcoming and helpful, brought us tea when we arrived early and waited for the room to be ready, oranised taxi and treks, always smiley and polite. Room beautiful and comfortable, rooftop pods amazing, with stunning views.
review.comment_negative:
Staying only 3 days
The sauna experience  - the sauna was a kind of coffin like semi horizontal box, you stepped in and covered yourself with a lid coming up to the neck. The floral bath was like a regular bubble bath in a wooden tub. Not impressed with the experience.

review.rating: Enough for a night in Sa Pa, but nothing special, would check other options.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff was nice and booked us a taxi to go to our next property. The staff offered us breakfast which was not included in the booking. The view from the rooftop bar was nice. The hotel staff kept our bags before check in and after check out.
review.comment_negative: The room looked quite shabby, unlike the pictures. It seemed to be the only room without a proper view (we could literally see a wall on the other side). The bathroom smelled a bit as it didn’t have windows. It lacked isolation, as I could hear everyone outside. The TV didn’t work properly. There was no one working on the rooftop bar when we got there and the seats were not comfortable. In addition, we were not able to check in early as we were told the hotel was fully booked.

review.comment_positive:

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
깔끔하고 무엇보다 위치가 좋습니다 깟깟마을도 도보로 갈 수 있고 판시판에 가기 위해 거쳐야 하는 선플라워와도 가깝습니다
조식도 맛있고 직원들의 응대도 친절하며 영어가 가능한 직원이 많아 의사소통에 문제는 없었습니다
에어컨도 베트남와서 묵은 숙소 중 가장 시원하게 가동됩니다

제일 좋었던 점은 풍광입니다 무조건! 마운틴뷰로 예약하세요
발코니에 의자 가져다놓고 한시간은 있었습니다 ㅎㅎ
사파의 선선하고 끈적이지 않는 날씨와 눈이 시원해지는 풍경을 즐길 수 있습니다 
빡빡한 일정이라 하룻밤을 보내고 가지만 다시 오게 된다면 하루종일 방에서 풍경을 구경하고 싶을 정도입니다
잘 쉬다 갑니다
review.comment_negative:
밤에 심한 폭우가 내려 마을 전체가 긴 시간 정전이 되었습니다
호텔도 1-2초 잠깐 정전되긴 했었지만 이후엔 괜찮았습니다
창을 내다보니 몇몇 호텔과 리조트 빼고는 다 정전이더라구요

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Great location, good breakfast & clean room! Mr OK, the manager was very helpful. The 6th terrace has a fantastic view & good for chilling. Highly recommended.

review.rating: Staff members were great, hotel was clean, and overall had a very memorable time in Sapa.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The facilities were clean and well-kept, which was all we needed. For the price of staying in Sapa, hotel and amenities were very affordable and reasonable. The staff was very attentive to our needs. All of them were very polite and had great customer service. Front desk gave us plenty of recommendations in terms of sightseeing, tourism, and food. They helped us book our tickets to Fansipan. Their rooftop deck also has a very great view of the mountains and terrain. Our booking did not include the breakfast buffet, but they provided it for us free of charge so long as we left a review on Booking.com. For the amount of food they had for breakfast, leaving a review was definitely a very fair bargain. Given how much I paid to stay here, would definitely book this hotel again if I ever visit Sapa another time in the future.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is located at a superb location of Sapa town and has a roof top that has a beautiful panoramic view of the mountains and town. I typically like the hospitality extended to me and my husband as our booking did not include breakfast but the hotel provided us with free breakfast knowing that food is not easily available outside in the early morning. Staff here always put on their smiles and are always helpful. I remember a receptionist by the name Anh Tuoi who has been extremely helpful and courteous. We like our stay at this hotel mainly due to the service of the staff and also the cleanliness of the room.
The room is clean and location of the hotel is superb.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: La camera dove abbiamo soggiornato in quattro persone era bella pulita e confortevole. Lo staff è stato super gentile cordiale e sempre disponibile per ogni qualsiasi evenienza. Colazione ottima ed abbondante. I camerieri super disponibili. Consiglio l'hotel anche per la distanza dal centro che è vicinissimo e comodo per tutto.

review.comment_positive: The hotel was amazing but the staff were even more amazing. The lovely manager was so kind and personable and we loved our interactions with him. We would definitely come back to this hotel if we visited Sapa again!

review.comment_positive: Great spot in Sapa, we had a beautiful room (the nicest we’ve stayed in Vietnam) which was huge and had everything you needed. Very clean and helpful staff as well. The roof terrace is a really great space with amazing views as well, would recommend!

review.comment_positive: De kamer op zich zelf was zeer ruim. Het bed was goed en het was schoon
review.comment_negative:
Je kan alleen in bad douchen. Voor een ruime badkamer valt het tegen dat er geen douche bij was of op zn minst een standaard waarin de douchekop kan. Verder zeer gehorig hotel. Van 'smorgensvroeg tot laat in de avond veel herrie en het tappenhuis wat te goed te horen is in de kamer. Grote groepen aanwezig. Ook is verbouwen op zondagmorgen vanaf 09.00 uur geen probleem. Smorgensvroeg ook blaffende honden en kraaiende hanen.
Ontbijt: alleen gericht op Aziatisch ontbijt. Geen engels sprekende kok waardoor een simpel gebakken eitje niet geregeld kon worden. Als westerling zou ik dit hotel niet aanraden. Voor een RELAX hotel, not so much relaxing........

review.rating: Double charged me for our stay, book at your own risk!
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Location was great and near to Sapa city center, but that was about everything good about this place.
review.comment_negative:
We booked 2 rooms for our party of 4. Hotel was catered to the lower tier mass market as loads of Asean and local tourists being bussed in daily. Morning breakfast was chaotic and food choices was poor. No facilities to speak of, the roof top bar was a rusting platform that looks way better on photos than in real life. We had a much better stay at an earlier guest house with much more personal service.

Hotel deducted the cost for our entire stay twice. I was puzzled when I received 2 notifications from my credit card issuer with the exact amounts being deducted 1 day before our scheduled stay. As we were in the hills trekking, I thought little of the notifications. Upon check-in, I was informed by receptionist that they accidentally double charged me for our 3 night stay for both rooms. Horribly slow follow up and service from the front desk as they said they cannot do the reversal on the same day. It took 3 days from check in to check out before we got some sort of update on the reversal. They had to do a physical run to the bank to get some form of documentation for me written in Vietnamese. It took another 10 days for their bank to resolve this with my credit card issuer. Till now, the issue was only partially resolved as only a partial amount was refunded back to my credit card. Book at your own risk.

Khách sạn ở vị trí trung tâm thị trấn, rất tiện đi đến các địa điểm du lịch ở Sapa. 
Khá tiện nghi, từng đồ vật nhỏ trong phòng thể hiện sự quan tâm từng chút đến khách.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ khách. 
Mức giá thuê khá rẻ so với những gì nhận được. 
Lúc về quản lý hỏi chuyện trực tiếp, nghe đánh giá từ khách để rút kinh nghiệm.
review.comment_negative: Nếu cải thiện những điểm nhỏ xíu đã góp ý trực tiếp với quản lý thì khách sạn sẽ tuyệt vời hơn nữa, lúc đấy cho 11 điểm luôn.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel in a stunning location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel was the nicest and the most comfortable of the 5  hotels we've stayed in on our trip to Vietnam. Really great beds, tastefully decorated rooms, nicely equipped bathrooms, just a general feeling of comfort and ease. The breakfast was varied and good. The staff was really lovely and helpful. Travelling by night train, we arrived to Sa Pa early - they allowed us to leave our luggage at the hotel to go and explore the resort. We returned a few hours before the official check-in and relaxed on the comfortable sofas in the hall with the staff bringing us delicious (and free) cups of tea we hadn't even needed to ask for. As we were waiting, they came to let us know that the family room was ready (a couple of hours before the official check-in time) and in a short while the double rooms were available, too. We had wonderful views from the room but especially from the roof top and the pods were amazing. The hotel arranged for a reasonable taxi service one day and on another day we went on track no 5 - the longest one they organised to remote villages in the mountain. This was an amazing experience for our whole group (9 people of different ages from 13 - 53)
review.comment_negative:
Provide salt and pepper for breakfast. A larger variety of fruit would be welcome. 
It was hard to leave after just 3 nights. This is what we liked least :-)

This accommodation was just beautiful. The rooftop bar had views over the valley and Fansipan mountain and every touch point was so well done. 

The staff were so friendly and accomodating they helped us with motorbike transports to villages, instructions and the best way to enjoy Fansipan (with varying options on how you can get to the top and providing suggestions on what would be best for the kids as well). Fantastic knowledge of what's available and around the area to enjoy.

review.comment_positive: The staff bribe you to give a 10/10 booking.com rating in return for free breakfasts during your stay. That would explain why the rating was so high. It's a decent budget accommodation but it definitely doesn't deserve a 9.6 rating. The rooms are aged, loud and not clean, the menu hasn't got many options, the rooftop doesn't serve food and is only open after 2pm, the spa gave my fiancé a rash for days after his massage. We're quite relaxed travelers so we're fine with the stay, however we know some people would be greatly disappointed and that's why we're sharing an honest review.

The hotel gave us free bfast for our 2 days stay and even prepare us a small gift when we check out. Though we check out at 12pm, they allowed us to put our luggages there till night. And the most touching thing, we asked for a favor of letting us to take a bath before we leave for hanoi. Hieu prepared us to take our bath at the hotel spa! Thank you so much Sapa Relax Hotel. You make our stay memorable.

review.comment_positive: Prima Lage, alles fußläufig erreichbar. Hotel mit Fahrstuhl, wir hatten ein schönes Balkonzimmer mit Blick ins Tal, das Hotel verfügt über eine sonnenreiche Aussichtsterrasse mit Bar und unschlagbarem Blick. Wir konnten schon früh morgens das Gepäck im Hotel deponieren und sogar am Abend des Abreise noch kurz duschen, obwohl wir ausgecheckt waren. Sehr freundliches Personal.
review.comment_negative: Die Empfehlung des etwas entfernten Massagesalons "Relax Spa in 50 Thach Son Str.," durch das Hotel war eine Katastrophe. Mitarbeiterinnen saßen völlig desinteressiert im Flur herum und guckten alle nur auf ihre Handys, Masseuse war total verschnupft, musste sich ständig schnäuzen. Handy lag auf der Massagebank und hat häufig vibriert, schlechte Massage, eiskalte Hände. Totaler Reinfall.

Frühcheck-in war trotz vorheriger Bestätigung nicht möglich. Das Personal war teilweise unfreundlich (u. a. haben sie uns einen überteuerten Preis fürs Taxi angeboten und meinten es gäbe nichts günstigeres. Der erste Taxifahrer, den wir auf der Straße fragten, nannte uns einen deutlich günstigsteren Preis, selbst ohne Verhandlung). Zudem war deutlich, dass die Bilder von der Dachterrasse sehr überarbeitet und verschönert waren.

review.rating: They tried, but really could not convince us
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
We were suprised how professionel the hotel seemed when we first entered. We even got free breakfast (as the receptionist told us to get better Booking reviews...). After a 2 Day it turned out that they unfortunately are not as professional and good as it seemed first. 
One really nice thing - we forgot our laundry when we departed for our sleeper. As we were really trough from the day we asked the hotel to send our laundry via motortaxi. And it really worked. That was a great help!
review.comment_negative:
Well yeah, for a cheap hotel all of the following points are okayish. But as this one tries to be professional and is not super cheap or anything like that, it was not okay for us.
First, the bathroom was oldish. Renovations were not carried out professionally, and the water came out of the shower everywhere. The ground in the whole room was a little dirty, and especially next to the bad was a set of nail remainings.. additionally, we had stains on our bad sheets that we only noticed in the night. Also, after the second cleaning, none of these points changed. What bothered me the most was an intense smell in the room that was simply nur good.
What was kind of annoying to us was that the receptionists did not speak English well. We tried it a couple of times, but it was so complicated that we just gave up. For example, we tried to book a tour over the hotel. They have a catalog, but when we asked for details and recommendations, he could not help us at all. But as we found an interesting tour in the catalog and it was okay with the price, we wanted to book either way. Even though we knew which tour we wanted very early, we were asked to book it only  in the evening. When we finally wanted to finalize the bookingm the reception told is he gave us the price for a wrong tour and named a much higher price instead. Even though it was already 10 PM and we had trusted him with the initial price, he did not give any discount. Since we were tired and many tour shops already closed, we then booked another tour for the original price. It was nice either way, but very very inconvenient.
Another important information for traveller's may be that we came back on our last day after check out and asked for anywhere to fresh up and relax for the next few ours. They were totally unhelpful and due to the language Barrera we gave up quickly. Gladfilly we found another very cheap hotel who took us for a few hours.
A small addition to the breakfast.

review.comment_positive:
Good selection of breakfast options- particularly the waffle making station and different noodle soups available.
Booked a trekking tour through reception which was cheaper online and we had a great time!
review.comment_negative:
- Noticed our floor was dirty when we checking in ( dust and toe nail), called and cleaner came straight away. Good experience with this!

- Smoking smell in bathroom despite it being non-smoking hotel: Told reception who weren’t very helpful, had to prompt for air freshener and asked for a room change, too which we were told they were fully booked. No one came for a while so we had to reach out again, they said they “checked all the rooms” and that there was no one smoking (basically insinuating we were lying & were very apologetic). Had to complain again before they miraculously found a free room for us to move into… this one also ended up smelling of Tabaco on our last day but we didn’t want the hassle.

It’s a shame as it tainted our experience at this hotel.

- Hotel cancelled our booking online on our last night (on booking) and essentially stopping us from collecting rewards points and being able to review. Had to get in touch with booking.com to sort this. Another hassle which tainted our experience

-Good facilities, location, breakfast and atmosphere, a more empathetic staff would make this place somewhere I would recommend to stay!

review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war super freundlich und lud uns sogar zum Frühstück ein. Das Frühstück war lecker, es gab sogar eine Nudelsuppenstation und es wurde frische Spiegeleier und Waffeln gemacht. 
Das Zimmer war sauber und schön eingerichtet. Die Dachterasse hat ein Caféwo man die tolle Aussicht genießen kann. Bei uns im April war es leider immer nebelig sodass man nicht weit sah. 
Die Lage des Hotels ist auch super. Sehr zentral.

review.rating: Overall, the hotel stay was not too bad considering the price but there are still rooms for improvement.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The rooftop bar is good for those who enjoy taking photos. The view is indeed instagrammable if the sky is clear.
review.comment_negative:
We reached the hotel in the early morning after taking the overnight bus to Sapa. It was unfortunate that the hotel room were fully booked and we had to take a rest at the concierge. When we finally get to check in, there were some issues with the tv which took 3 - 4 different persons to resolve.

Compared to the hotel we stayed in Hanoi, the customer service was not as great as we had wished for… when we asked the hotel staff about food recommendations, they only told us to get food from the hotel. When we seek help to find out about the train transport from Lao Cai to Hanoi, the staff was also unable to give us the advice and could only recommend us the bus company.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Our stay at the sapa relax and spa hotel was excellent. Duoc made sure everything was brilliant for us. The room was large and clean, they offered us free breakfast (which was excellent quality) and a free drink at the rooftop cafe (which has incredible views and makes lovely drinks!). This hotel has everything you would need for a stay in sapa and exceeded all expectations given the very good price. If you’re coming to sapa stop wasting time looking  at hotels and book this one!

review.comment_positive:
-ห้องดีมากเมื่อเทียบราคา แต่งสวย เตียงนอนสบาย  ห้องน้ำ น้ำไหลแรง มีอ่างอาบน้ำทุกห้อง มีสายชำระ ตอนจองบอกไม่รวมอาหารเช้า แต่ไปถึงได้อาหารเช้าทั้ง 2 วันเกินคาดเลย อาหารเช้าใช้ได้เลย เฝออร่อย 

-ทำเลดีนะ เดินไป sun plaza ไม่ไกล 2-300 เมตร   แต่มีแอบเหนื่อยนิดหน่อยเพราะมีเดินขึ้นเขาเล็กน้อย ไปโบสถ์ ทะเลสาบอยู่ในระยะเดินได้สบายๆทุกแห่ง

-ดาดฟ้าชั้น 6 วิวสวยมาก เห็นวิวเขา แถมคูปองเวลคัมดริงค์ไปแลกเครื่องดื่มที่ชั้น 6 ได้ด้วย

-ใกล้โรงแรมแค่ 100 เมตร มีร้าน Sapa Sky View Rautaurant and bat เป็นร้านอาหารที่วิวสวยมาก ฝากท้องได้ทั้งเช้า กลางวัน เย็น
review.comment_negative: -ห้องแฟมิลีรูม พักได้ 4 คน  เป็นห้อง connect แต่ห้องน้ำมีห้องเดียว ไม่พอสำหรับ 4 คน ถ้ามีห้องน้ำแยกสองห้อง จะ peefect มาก

review.rating: Fijn hotel is het centrum van Sapa
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: De kamer was erg mooi en ruim. We hadden een badkamer met een bad en de locatie was top, midden in het centrum van Sapa. Tegenover het hotel kon je scooters huren en tours  boeken. De massages in de spa zijn heerlijk en het dakterras is top.
review.comment_negative: Het was best wel gehorig.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel is so clean, beds were comfy and spacious. We booked into the spa and had a lovely experience with us being provided with a discount on our treatments. The staff were so helpful, the receptionist Mr. OK provided us with complimentary breakfast when we checked in for the following morning. Stunning view of the mountains from the rooftop bar. Location was good only a 5 minute walk from shops and restaurants and a 10/15 minute walk to the main street. Staff provided us with a handmade bag as a leaving gift upon checkout. Highly recommend staying here!

Our experience was both luxurious and affordable, a perfect combination.

review.rating: Highly recommended for their location, great view of Sapa and unbeatable hospitality!
review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive:
it is located within the Sapa town and close enough to Sapa Station. I like the suite and the fact that they provided me with slightly earlier check in. There is a wonderful view of Sapa mountains and valley from the room top cafe. I did enjoy the bathtub in my bathroom as well.

They were kind to include complementary breakfast and also gave me a nice gift when I left. Thanks to the owner and staff for making me feel welcome!
review.comment_negative: The AC was restricted to heater mode. There was no way to cool the room except to open the windows. I didn’t want to as I’m afraid of insects invading my room (an experience I had in another hotel in Sapa) at night.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Unser Aufenthalt im Sapa Relax Hotel war sehr schön. Wir haben nachts um 2 eingecheckt und es gab keine Probleme. Das Frühstück war sehr gut, am besten waren die frischen Waffeln. Das Personal war wahnsinnig freundlich und bemüht. Das riesige Bett war sehr gemütlich.
review.comment_negative: Blöd war, dass es morgens um 6 Uhr sehr laut wurde, weil eine Pumpe oder Ähnliches angestellt wurde. Das hat uns früh aus dem Bett getrieben - aber dafür konnten wir länger das Frühstück genießen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố

review.comment_positive:
얼리체크인은 안되었지만, 간단하게 화장실을 사용가능하였고 그래도 2시 전에 체크인을도와주었다.
수건도 부족하였으나 바로 이야기하니 수건도 추가 제공이 되었습니다.
위치도 괜찮았고 전반적으로 만족스러웠습니다.
그나마 아쉬웠던 부분은 마운틴 뷰가 아니어서 커텐은
항상 치고 있어야 한다는 점이었다. 마운틴 뷰는 조식하는 곳이랑 옥상에서 볼 수 있다.

review.comment_positive: Location was great, staff were very helpful, bed was comfy. Rooftoop was lovely (although difficult communicate with staff). We didnt eat at the hotel so couldnt comment on the restaurant. Overall we had a lovely stay in sapa.
review.comment_negative: We were on the 5th floor city view room and it was very noisy, possible this is not isolated to this particular hotel as the town is very busy. We had a connecting room but the balcony door did not lock in one of the rooms. And in the night a very strong smell of cigarette smoke wafted through our room through the aircon vent. Someone clearly smoking in their room or near the ducts, it was bad enough to wake us. We really wanted to give them a 10 star review as they requested however because of these things we feel an 8 is more honest.

review.rating: Great location, reasonable price, caring staff and management and impeccabily clean
review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive: The location of the property was ideal.  Very near everything we wanted in Sapa town but not sitting on top of a noisy bar or along the main road where you'd find traffic noise.  The room we stayed in room 301 was actually bigger than we are used to including a living area a bedroom and a large restroom area.   The breakfast was quite nice and the egg station as well as the made to order Pho was a highlight.  The room had a nice view of the valley and the mountains beyond although to be fair it is not completely unobstructed (It didn't need to be honestly as you could get an unobstructed view easily on the 6th floor skybar.   The staff were very friendly and willing to help.  We arrived before normal check in and they offered to check us in early to a room on the 2nd floor although we opted to wait a little bit for a room on a higher floor.  The bathtub is very spacious and feels luxurious.  It is not, however, a whirlpool bath as there are no jets.   The hotel supplies two bottles of water in the room for free in ecological glass bottles but we really appreciated the water refilling station in the lobby.
review.comment_negative: The Shower is part of the bathtub and you must hold the shower to effectively wash your hair. A simple wall bracket to hold the shower head would make this easier.  We had read other reviews and expected this so we had no problems with it but perhaps in the future the hotel might install a longer hose and a bracket holder to make it a bit easier for guests.  The Hotel is in the middle of the city and as such may be affected by the actions of neighbors. One particularly naughty neighbor decided that raising a rooster in a cage literally outside the window of our bedroom would be a good idea.  We stayed two nights and chose not to complain about the rooster after the first night as we have frequently stayed in places with such noises and figured it was beyond the control of the hotel.   We mentioned it in at checkout and the manager Mr. Ok was quite concerned and very apologetic. He explained that he would buy the rooster from the neighbor so future guests should 1) Not have problems with the rooster and 2) should immediately bring any concerns to the manager Mr. Ok even if you think such things may be beyond the control of the hotel.   Mr. OK and the staff at the hotel are supper willing to do whatever they can to make the stay the best it can be.   Overall, guests should remember that this is a 3 star hotel and our high rating is a result of the value and quality of this 3 star property.  If you come expecting a 5 star experience you likely won't be happy with Sapa Relax Hotel but for a 3 star property this hotel exceeds expectations

Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The location is located at the center of Sapa. It's very convenience to get a bike rental, good local Sapa restaurants, grocery stores and local massage spa. 

Besides, the hotel has its own rooftop cafe which has a nice view of Sapa, you can see both city and mountain view as the same time. 

In term of facilities, this hotel has its all such as hot water, functional aircondition, useable WiFi and strong internet conditions. Breakfast buffet is good beyond the price. 

Last but not least, hotel staffs have a good service minded, humble and helpful specially thanks to Mr.Sommai Xayyavong for taking care of us and be our translator for our stay. See you next time!!.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive:
В отеле работает потрясающий персонал - менеджеры на ресепшен открытые и дружелюбные, подскажут по любому вопросу. Приятной неожиданностью для нас был завтрак по системе шведский стол, который изначально не входил в стоимость номера. Завтрак очень разнообразный и вкусный.
Номера чистые, просторные, потрясающий вид на горы.
По окончании нашего пребывания менеджер подарил нам на прощание сумку-авоську с национальной вышивкой Сапы, мы были очень тронуты!

review.rating: Let the hotel speak for itself instead of pressuring guests
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel had a good breakfast and was conveniently located. The room size was good.
review.comment_negative:
The room was did not feel very clean. The head board of the bed was fabric/leather and you could see it was covered in dust. 
The room was also quite loud although walking around Sapa I suspect this would be an issue everywhere. It’s quite a loud little city. 
The main issue we had here was that during our entire stay we were pressured by the hotel to leave a good review. They offered us a room upgrade and breakfast but every time we interacted with the staff they would ask if we’d reviewed the hotel yet. Even one morning we went to get breakfast and before we were allowed they made me pull out my phone to try and review them. It made our stay very uncomfortable and we actually ending up leaving early before our booking ended. We would rather not be given anything free and be able to have a peaceful stay rather than feel all the other reviews were disingenuous and be harassed.

We tried the massage in hotel which wasn’t that great. No housekeeping and we have to request for fresh towels and coffee/mineral to be replenished, thankfully their response was fast.

review.room_type: Suite nhìn ra núi
review.comment_positive: They kindly offered us a voucher for breakfast which was great. It was nice to leave our luggage while we explored Mount Fansipan for the day and we even got to use the spa services upon return as well. Room size was great and bed was very comfortable.

Suite nhìn ra núi
Phòng Deluxe Gia đình
review.comment_positive: La suite familiale était spacieuse et confortable. Le spa offrait des massages de grande qualité dans la quiétude, ce qui n’est pas le cas dans les spas environnants. Cela valait amplement les quelques dongs supplémentaires. Le buffet était bien et il nous a été offert gratuitement pour la durée de notre séjour même si cela n’était pas inclus dans notre réservation. La vue de la salle à manger est vraiment magnifique. L’hôtel est bien située dans le centre du village de Sa Pa et près de tout. L’insonorisation des portes du balcon n’est vraiment pas bonne pour les personnes qui souhaitent faire des siestes dans la journée, mais pour la nuit c’est plus calme donc c’était parfait pour nous. Le personnel est aimable et très serviable. Un excellent rapport qualité/prix, j’y retournerais sans problème. Les photos, comme toutes celles sur les sites de réservation, sont retouchées et améliorées, mais je suis quand même satisfaite de l’état des lieux.
review.comment_negative: L’insonorisation des chambres. Le réseau WiFi est parfois instable.

review.comment_positive: De mensen die in dit hotel werken zijn superaardig (vooral Anh Tuoi) en klantvriendelijk/gastvrij. We zijn op huwelijksreis: de kamer was heel leuk gemaakt voor onze huwelijksreis. De locatie van het hotel is top: alles is makkelijk te bereiken vanuit hier. Het bed sliep lekker. De kamer was ruim. Ook dakterras heeft een mooi uitzicht.
review.comment_negative: Voor dit bedrag hadden we wel een luxer hotel verwacht: alles deed een beetje oud aan. De badkamer kan bijvoorbeeld wel een opknapbeurt gebruiken. Het ontbijt vonden we niet lekker en veel producten waren niet vers.  Ook was de ontbijtzaal heel rommelig met veel te veel stoelen. Het is heel gehorig in en rondom het hotel.

review.comment_positive:
- ที่พักค้นหาได้ง่าย ราคาไม่แพง และมีแถมอาหารเช้าให้ด้วย โดยไม่ต้องจ่ายเงินเพิ่ม (ตอนจองไม่มีให้เลือกแบบควบอาหารเช้า)
- มีคาเฟ่ และจุดชมวิวบนชั้น 6 ของโรงแรม วิวสวยมาก และมีสปา
- อาหารเช้าครบถ้วนแบบพื้นฐาน ของเยอะ รสชาติดี
- เตียงนุ่มหลับสบาย พักห้องเตียงเดี่ยวเตียงใหญ่มาก น้ำร้อนน้ำเย็นใช้ได้ไม่มีปัญหา
- มีที่จอดรถหน้าโรงแรมประมาณ 4 คัน
review.comment_negative:
- ห้องพักแบบเตียงคู่ อ่างล้างหน้าล้างมืออยู่นอกห้องน้ำ เวลาใช้มีเลอะเทอะบ้าง 
- ที่พักหากจะเดินไป Sun Plaza โบสถ์ ทะเลสาป ต้องมีขึ้นลงทางชัน หากมีผู้สูงอายุอาจไม่สะดวก

While the hotel did not have a pool it does boast a very nice rooftop cafe and definitely calls for a photo shoot! Very nice view and great for dinner too.

review.comment_positive: We liked that it was centrally located in the middle of town.
review.comment_negative: It was very loud from all the idiot taxis that love to lay on their horns around the clock. There was no Relax at this hotel. Also- it was not clean. There was black mold in the shower and the floors hadn’t been mopped in ages.  When I went to check out the hotel manager told me I needed to pay for a towel that I used as a bath mat. Hilarious because there was no bath mat to keep me from slipping and falling and it was only dirty from the floor in the room. I then told him no, I wouldn’t pay and I proceeded to show him the shower pictures of the mold etc.  He said if I didn’t pay then it would come out of his paycheck. What a racket, and a lie. Well if he was in charge then maybe it should come out of his check for not overseeing the jobs that the housekeepers were doing. He told me if there was a problem with my room not being clean then I should have called the front desk.  At that point I told him I had. Like 9 times and no one would pick up the phone!!!! So this hotel is a joke. The room would be ok if it was clean. But it still would be loud as can be!!!! And the breakfast in the morning is so gross.  You will want to eat elsewhere.  Be prepared.

review.rating: Nettes Hotel, bei dem man keinesfalls eine Busfahrt buchen sollte
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Die Lage ist ausgezeichnet. Das Hotelpersonal war sehr freundlich und bemüht. Wir haben sogar Frühstück bekommen und unsere Wäsche zum waschen abgeben können, was perfekt funktioniert hat.
Wenn wir etwas reklamiert haben, wurde sofort darauf reagiert.
review.comment_negative:
Wir mussten einige Dinge erst nachfragen, damit sie funktionierten. Z.B. Safe funktionierte nicht - wurde ausgetauscht. Staub auf oberen Brettern im Kasten. Teilweise habe wir Sachen rasch selbst abgestaubt, damit wir alle Ablageflächen nutzen können. 
Am schlimmsten war, dass wir im Hotel gefragt haben, wo wir eine Busfahrt von Sapa nach Halong buchen können. Weil man das selbst nicht macht, begleitete man uns zum Nachbarhotel Royal, wo die Fahrt gebucht wurde. Schlussendlich waren wir dann über 10 Stunden in einem völlig heruntergekommenen Sleeperbus unterwegs, der so überfüllt war, dass alle Gänge mit Leuten vollgelegt warenn. Außerdem hat der Bus nicht für Toilettenpausen angehalten. Keiner sprach ein Wort Englisch und wir wurden unfreundlich behandelt. Wir hatten eines der besten Zimmer im Hotel gebucht und wurden dann zu einem überhöhten Preis von 500.000 Dong in einem letztklassigen Bus untergebracht. Wir haben bei der Hinfahrt um 350K einen wirklichen komfortablen Sleeperbus gebucht und wissen daher, dass es auch andere Busse gibt. Wir sind sehr enttäuscht und wollen des dringend davon abraten, sich in diesem Hotel Unterstützung für einen Transport zu holen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The roof top bar has a great view which you can use. Hotel is situated close to the Fansipan station for you to visit if you are interested. Hotel is good location to the bus stop from getting between Sapa and Lao Cai.

review.comment_positive: The hotel staff were lovely and helpful with organising taxis. For the price of the hotel, it was an ok experience. I just would like to know about these things if I was to look at staying.
review.comment_negative:
I’m not one to write a negative review unless I really feel the need to but there was too many less than positive experiences from our hotel stay and I would like others to know. 

Our hotel room wasn’t the cleanest and as soon as my partner sat on the couch for the first time, a big clump of hair got stuck to him. The hotel rooms have a bath but no shower, it does have bath with a hand held shower attachment but as my partner and I are tall, the hose was not long enough to reach our head so we had to crouch down. Just a painful experience when you just want a shower after a long day.

The room service menu is only in Vietnamese and no English option so when I went down to the lobby to order around 2pm, I was told the kitchen only opens at night. 

There is no “do not disturb” or “please clean the room” sign to put on our door so you get woken up by house keeping coming into the clean your room in the early morning. We told them no and wasn’t a nice way to be woken up. 

The aircon is set to a timer that we can’t change that automatically shuts off after a few hours. I had to get up multiple times in the night to turn it back on. 

The hotel is genuinely quite noisey. With furniture being heard moved all the times above us or the rooster next door or the constant loud parties around us. Wasn’t an overly peaceful place.

El hotel está ubicado en una zona ideal céntrica , cerca de todo. Si tú habitación da a las montañas el ruido de la ciudad es menor, y las vistas espectaculares. Nos han cuidado con muchos detalles. Las mejores habitaciones son en los numero 01 si quieres unas vistas de las montañas más completas. Nuestra estancia ha sido magnifica, aunque el hotel no es muy nuevo, lo mantienen súper limpio y cuidado. Gracias por todo!

review.rating: An enjoyable stay and very helpful staff and good location as it is centrally located.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
I and my daughter stayed here for 2 nights and 3 days and we enjoyed the hotel very much. The location is in central of Sapa and just 5 minutes walk to the ticket office for the cable car to the Fansipan mountain, 5 minutes walk to the Sapa centre, lots of restaurants and clothing stores, shops, coffee shops etc.

The staff were friendly and very helpful and polite, thank you! 

The hotel even provided a pedestal fan which was very helpful if you wanted to use it to dry up some clothes if required.

The price for early December period was also pretty good as it is normally a low key season in Sapa. 

Overall it was a wonderful stay, and considering if the price is right I will come back to this hotel in my next visit to Sapa.
review.comment_negative: The balcony of my room (Deluxe Superior room with city view) was much smaller than I. have expected). No mini bar fridge so we could not store the foods. May be the hotel could consider getting one as users may need to store foods in summer?

review.comment_positive:
We really enjoyed our stay, we were here for 3 nights. Housekeeping did a fantastic job and the room was always kept lovely and clean. The staff were all very friendly and helpful, we have to give a special mention to Mr T on reception who helped us a great deal, free breakfast as we were staying more than 1 night which was very generous. Breakfast was a good buffet selection a mix of Vietnamese and continental with a good choice and very yummy. Mr T booked a cab to take us to a couple of places we wanted to visit in Sapa. We made use of the laundry service which was very quick and efficient. 

The location in Sapa was fantastic, very walkable as close to the main town. 

We also made use of the hotel's spa in town (not the one based within the hotel) we preferred to walk, but Mr T did say we could use a free taxi service provided by the hotel if we wanted to. We thoroughly recommend the Relax spa in town, it is really lovely!! 

We also got a free bag when leaving the hotel which is a really lovely touch and special keepsake for us both.
review.comment_negative: The only reason to deduct a star is the room is a bit dated and tired and not as nice as the photos portray, that being said the room was massive with a nice mountain view from the lounge side (with small  balcony). The corner bath was nice, but not secured to the floor and the safe in our room didn't work, we didn't bring this to the attention of staff as we were not too concerned, however we have no doubt that should we have brought this to their attention it would have been dealt with swiftly.

review.comment_positive: 뷰가 진짜 좋았어요. 직원도 완전 친절. 판시판 가는 티켓 예약도 도와주고 (별도의 수수료 없이) 택시 잡는 것도 도와줘서 도움이 많이 됐어요. 조식 잘 나옵니다! 아 루프탑 카페에서 사진 찍으면 인생샷 나와요:) 카페에 사람도 많지 않아서 여유롭게 풍경 즐기고 사진찍고 쉴 수 있어요.
review.comment_negative: 제가 갔던 날이 유독 가격이 비쌌는데... 1박에 14만원짜리 낸 걸 고려하면 안에 시설이 너무 낡았습니다.(샤워기헤드 손잡이가 좀 부서져있고, 샤워기 거치대가 고정이 안 되고, 드라이기 손잡이가 고정이 안 되는..) 낡은 것들은 수리나 교체가 필요해 보이네요.

Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Мы бронировали номер с видом на горы и действительно открывается с балкона чудесный вид. Понравился бар с террасой на крыше. Очень удобная кровать - подушки, матрац, постельное белье. Всё было приятное и чистое. Каждый день меняли полотенца и давали воду.

Было очень приятно, что нам дали бесплатный завтрак в обмен на отзыв, но нам об отзыве напоминали каждое утро и на каждом завтраке нам говорили - точно оставите отзыв? К концу отдыха это уже начало напрягать.

Выселение было в 12:00 - что приятно. Также дали подарок при выселении.
review.comment_negative: Отель немного «уставший», по фотографиям мне казалось, что он новый, современный, но на самом деле номера уже не новые.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
Everything from the movement we step in is perfect till the day we check out .The receptionist and manager of the hotel are very helpful and always there to assist from small things like booking rides to arrangement of room extension and even offer us a free upgrade when doing so . 

Breakfast is perfect for a nutritional meal to start the day and we are being offered 1 complimentary  breakfast for a 2 night stay by the hotel manager and hotel is within distance to sunshine plaza and alley of restaurants and bars , definitely a hotel to stay when visiting sapa , I am sure you will be well taken of .
review.comment_negative: Sound proofing of hotels can be better

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
위치가 사파에서 제일 좋습니다.바로 옆에 끝내주는 뷰 맛집들이 즐비합니다. 호텔 지하의 마사지 샾은 저렴하고 잘합니다.(단 조용하고 품위있는 느낌은 아니고 전형적인 동남아 마사지입니다) 안개가 많이 끼는 산동네라 다른 호텔들도 마찬가지고 다들 오래되 보입니다. 다만 깨끗하게 잘 관리되있습니다.
옥상에 카페가 뷰가 좋습니다. 조식 뷔페에서 쌀국수와 계란은 직접 만들어줍니다. 뷔페식이고 원탁에서 먹는겁니다. 맛이 꽤좋습니다.
review.comment_negative: 주말에는 베트남 현지단체 관광객에게 이용되는듯 합니다. 따라서 세심한 서비스를 기대하기 어려울 가능성도 있습니다. 혼자 가볍게 이용하기에는 가격대가 높은 편입니다. 한국의 모텔정도 수준의 방인에 1박에 8-9만원은 조금 비싼 감이 있습니다.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Die Lage war echt super und das Personal war richtig freundlich. Wir kamen um 5:30 an und haben Tee bekommen sowie Frühstücksbuffet (für 4€). Wir haben beim Check-Out als Danke noch eine Tasche geschenkt bekommen.
review.comment_negative: Das Bad stand nach dem duschen unter Wasser.. dafür gibt es keine gute Lösung, die Dichtungen scheinen nicht zu funktionieren. Es gab keine gute Klimaanlage, sodass es im Zimmer total feucht war und das Wasser an der gesamten Fensterfront zu sehen war. Es roch auch sehr feucht. Das Bett war teilweise kaputt und ist bei einer Bewegung an einer Stelle von einer Erhebung gerutscht. Man sieht, dass das Zimmer und Hotel älter ist, da es viele Abnutzungsstellen gibt. Im Spa roch leider die Unterlage der Massagebank nicht gut/frisch. Der Raum war leider auch nicht richtig sauber und es war sehr alt. Ein schöner Duft im Spa wäre nicht verkehrt gewesen.

Polecam

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: My wife and I enjoyed our 2-night stay here. Very good service from the hotel staff who was always quick and ready to help. Lovely clean room with a comfortable bed and hot, powerful shower that's perfect for cold days. They gave us complementary breakfast for 2 days and breakfast was great - enjoyed the yummy local dishes, the lovely natural and fresh juices, waffle and eggs, fruits and yogurt. It was also such a nice gesture to receive a check-out souvenir- a nice locally handcrafted bag. Definitely cherished our stay here.

review.comment_positive: El alojamiento en general estaba bastante bien, el desayuno de los mejores que hemos tenido hasta ahora en vietnam porque tenía muchas opciones occidentales y había gofres!!! Los masajes eran muy buenos también y las habitaciones cómodas.
review.comment_negative: La limpieza brilla un poco por su ausencia, mucho polvo en todos los sitios, la colada nos la devolvieron con muchísimas pelusas enormes y…la joya de la corona… encontramos dos cucarachas en el cuarto. No pensaba ni comentarlo porque parecía una casualidad cuando encontramos la primera pero pretendían echar spry y que siguiéramos allí. Seguimos en la cama tirados y me CAYO EN LA CARA. Al irnos encontramos otra más. Podría ser casualidad pero siendo honesta no volvería, buen trauma para casa. Al final nos cambiaron de habitación a una mejor pero había bastantes polillas y no me fui con buena espina.

review.comment_positive:
The staff were very nice, and the check-in process was smooth. 

They were thoughtful and left us a big umbrella in our room to use during our stay. Which came in handy because it was raining a lot while we were there.  

The manager also gave us complimentary breakfast, which was much appreciated as their breakfast buffet was pretty good. It had a decent spread of Western and local food.
review.comment_negative:
The hotel was located next to a school, so it can get a bit noisy with the kids playing and the school bell ringing. 

It didn't help that our room happened to be facing directly at the school, so the noise was very noticeable for us. It was hard to take an afternoon nap. 

But this isn't a problem at night. We slept pretty well through the night, and it helped that the beds were really comfortable.

review.comment_positive:
-Chambre propre et spacieuse offrant une vue magnifique sur les montagnes.
-Excellent emplacement !
-Nous avons pu accéder à notre chambre plus tôt que prévu, grâce au nouveau Manager de l'hôtel. Une attention que nous avons appréciée
-La terrasse sur le toit de l'hôtel est tout simplement magnifique.
-Le petit-déjeuner est super bon et varié (merci encore une fois au Manager de l'hôtel pour nous l'avoir offert gratuitement).

review.comment_positive: Bardzo miły personel. Dostaliśmy gratis śniadanka. Pokój był ładny i stosunkowo duży. Panowie na recepcji mówili po angielsku. Można było zrobić pranie. Dostaliśmy prezent na zakończenie pobytu.
review.comment_negative:
Wybrałam ten hotel ze względu na taras. Pierwszego dnia na tarasie była impreza zamknięta. Kolejnego wieczoru taras był zamknięty i była zła pogoda. Z tarasu można korzystać głównie rano. 
Widok z pokoju "na miasto" oznacza widok na inny budynek, który znajduje się bardzo blisko i na głośną ulice. Polecam mieć zatyczki do uszu. Na prześcieradle były plamy.

Si tuviera que volver a SAPA, sería sin duda mi primera opción.

review.comment_positive: 위치가 좋아 어디든 도보 이동이 자유롭다. 이른 새벽 도착했는데 친절하게 안내를 해주고, 로비의 화장실을 자유롭게 사용하기 편했다. 스태프가 모두 친절하다. 판시판산 케이블카 티켓을 매표소와 동일하게 예약해줘서 줄 안서고 편하게 이용했다.

They gave us free breakfast even though it wasn't included and they also let us leave our luggage when we returned from our trek as our train transfer wasn't until later. The gift on checkout was also unexpected and very sweet. We loved our stay and would come back again.

review.comment_positive: They allowed us to leave our bags at the hotel after we checked out, as we did our 2D1N sapa trek. Also, we were able to shower in the spa toilet after we were back from the trek (but we had to take turns as there was only one toilet). Location was good.
review.comment_negative:
While the FAQ says we can do early check in before 9am by paying 50% of the room charge, it is not guaranteed and is still subject to room availabilities on the day itself. Only got informed on the latter part on the ‘subject to availability’ after we made the booking. Was eventually advised to book one more day to secure the room on the day of early check in (at full cost), which we did and was glad to do so. They also enticed us with free breakfast for good ratings on the app before we even got into our room (but we took it up nonetheless). Not much that I would dispute the rating for :)

Some rooms weren’t very soundproof (according to my friends) but it wasn’t a big deal.

Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Abbiamo soggiornato due notti al Sapa Relax Hotel. Ci sono venuti incontro in modo. A seguito di un grossissimo imprevisto che abbiamo avuto ci hanno consentito di spostare la data del nostro soggiorno. Visto che avevamo prenotato due tipologie di stanze diverse ci hanno fatto l'upgrade gratuito alla camera di tipologia migliore. La camera era davvero molto bella e completa di tutto. Ci hanno offerto la colazione per due mattine, una colazione molto buona con ampia scelta sopratutto di salato ma con anche alcune proposte dolci e buonissima frutta fresca. Il personale è super gentile e disponibile. Abbiamo anche fatto un massaggio ai piedi di 60 minuti alla SPA e ci è piaciuto davvero molto. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è ottimo e assolutamente consiglio il soggiorno  presso questo hotel.

review.comment_negative:
La chambre était décevante par rapport aux photos : plus vieillotte, moins propre, minuscule fenêtre qui donne sur un mur en béton, odeur qui émane des rideaux et des oreillers, lits très durs. 
Le petit déjeuner se termine très tôt (9h) donc pas de grasse matinée possible. 
Très mauvaise isolation phonique : on entendait tout ce qui se passait dans les couloirs.

Location are quite strategic as well, walking distance to restaurants, bbq/steamboat, church, museum, sapa station etc. What I love the most about this hotel is the people working there. Meanwhile I really appreciate the assistance from the front desk manager, Marcus, Huy and Trang who offered their help with bus booking, taxi booking with a cheaper price (because is only 2 of us, hence a small car will do), and change of room as I have extended few nights. Thank you!

review.comment_positive: Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hat uns bei der Ankunft sogar mit Tee begrüßt. Die Lage des Hotels ist ausgezeichnet, man hat alles in der Nähe und das ist ein idealer Startpunkt zum Wandern. Das Doppelbett war sehr groß und der Ausblick des Zimmers auf die Berge war sehr schön! Das Hotel hat uns sogar das Frühstück geschenkt. Das Buffet war vielseitig und es wurde auf Wunsch Nudelsuppe, verschiedene Eierspeisen und Waffeln gemacht. Insgesamt sind wir mit dem Besuch in diesem Hotel sehr zufrieden und würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen, sollten wir nochmal in Sapa sein.
review.comment_negative: Einziger kleiner Kritikpunkt ist, dass unser Kissen etwas dreckig war und die Dusche wenig Kraft hatte. Das Personal hat uns von sich aus angesprochen, was sie verbessern könnten und haben das Feedback sehr gut aufgenommen und versprochen sich zu bessern - was wir auch glauben :)

review.comment_negative:
יש בחדר ריח של עובש שמגיע מעובש במקלחת.
המצעים והמגבות לא מספיק נקיים ומלאים בכתמים.
לא מנקים את החדר מספיק טוב, לא החליפו כוסות שתיה.
המים שמביאים הם לא מינרלים.
יש רעש בלתי פוסק ממכוניות, תרנגולות ושומעיםואנשיל שעוברים במסדרון.
הדירוג הגבוה של המלון מגיע משוחד שהפקיד קבלה מציע ארוחת בוקר חינם תמורת דירוג 10 באתר.

review.comment_negative: Nothing that we didn't like.
